alert.note: Alert for Brooks (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:11PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Brooks County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1010 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Airport Road Addition, or 7 miles southeast of Premont, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Falfurrias, Pleasant Park and Brooks County Detention Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Deep South Texas.
